alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 4:14PM MST until January 14 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches except up to 15 inches at mountain tops. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Sunday. Snow beginning after midnight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
